title: Mobile Augmented Reality-Based Science Education Design: Interactive Employee Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and introductory knowledge in science fields
context.additional_context: Customized design is needed to address the lack of AR technology experience and enhance mobile learning adaptability. Providing an integrated educational environment with MAR (Mobile Augmented Reality) content within the LMS

learning_goals: Independently perform three or more types of science experiment simulations using mobile augmented reality (MAR) tools.
Complete over 80% of topic-based learning content in an LMS-based interactive m-training environment.
Achieve over 70% of the evaluation criteria for applying scientific principles through AR project outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
